main

Class Boot

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Boot

  • public class Boot
extends java.lang.Object
    This is main the class which launches the game and displays the screen to the user. This class is a view in MVC architecture. This class pulls the map from the model after each iteration

      This constructor initializes openGL library , accepts user input to either start a new game or load the saved game

        public int newGame()
